org.owasp.esapi.reference
Class DefaultExecutor

railo-context.Component
        org.owasp.esapi.util.Object
            org.owasp.esapi.reference.DefaultExecutor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Executor 
public class DefaultExecutor

extends Object

Reference implementation of the Executor interface. This implementation is very restrictive. Commands must exactly equal the canonical path to an executable on the system. Valid characters for parameters are codec dependent, but will usually only include alphanumeric, forward-slash, and dash.

Constructor Summary
init(ESAPI ESAPI)

 string executeSystemCommand(any executable, Array params, any workdir, any codec)

Method Detail

executeSystemCommand

public string executeSystemCommand(any executable, Array params, any workdir, any codec)
The reference implementation sets the work directory, escapes the parameters as per the Codec in use, and then executes the command without using concatenation. If there are failures, it will be logged. Privacy Note: Be careful if you pass PII to the executor, as the reference implementation logs the parameters. You MUST change this behavior if you are passing credit card numbers, TIN/SSN, or health information through this reference implementation, such as to a credit card or HL7 gateway.

Specified by:
executeSystemCommand in interface Executor
Parameters:
executable
params
workdir
codec
